title: About Me
introText: Hi, my name is Christian and I'm currently a 20 year old CEGEP student completing my final semester at Champlain College Saint-Lambert Computer Science Technology Technical DEC.
journeyText: I love learning and making whatever I feel like on the computer. The most important thing that I've realized through living is the fact that there's no perfect anything but through collaboration and open communication, figuring out an optimal solution for all is possible. This extends to how I view user experience especially. On top of all that, I do find that most importantly, not understanding where to start, although scary, is only a natural part of the process for everything great to happen!
skillsText:
• Game development and thinking about user experience
• 2D, 3D, and programs such as Blender for example
• Music DAWs such as LMMS and FL Studio
• Experimenting with personal software
• Playing Video Games (My favorite being Minecraft)
• Watching Adam Sandler movies.
outsideText: I am always for the lookout of awesome people who do creative things and have much to share about any topics they're interested in. If you're one of those people, feel free to contact me!
